long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Input Unlocked is an open-source extension that enhances usability, convenience, and accessibility. The creation of this extension was inspired by websites that hurt the user experience by disabling or marking web inputs like text boxes and password fields as read only.

* Permissions: 
We require the bare minimum for the functionality of the extension.

* GitHub source and details:
https://github.com/Adobe-Android/web-input-unlocked
